attributes.action: Help the Uyghurs people from their worst nightmare.
attributes.additional_details: It’s our duty to help our brothers and sisters from this mess.It’s our duty to go save them, with us sharing and standing together it’s possible to defeat Chinas new law.
attributes.background: China has declared Islam as  a “mental illness”.Forcing people to leave the religion and making them eat pork and drink alcohol. The Uyghurs people are taken into concentration camp so they can be “healed”.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266783
